title: enda mukham
sahitya:
enda mukham ninaindAlum unran mukham tOnrum vindi enna sholvEn kaNNA


anupallavi

  annai tandai ANDaruLum guruvuDan bandhu sondam naNbar enru vivavidamAi


caraNam    mundai janmat-toDar piNaippO ellA janmattilum uLLa iNaippO anri
 bandham viTTup-pOna pinbu aDaindiDum gandham kamazh kazhaliNaiyin aravaNaippO
